hero.name: Flavio Terenzi
hero.title: Full-Stack Application Developer
hero.description: With a strong focus on backend and software architecture, I transform complex problems into elegant solutions, prioritizing clean code and scalable systems.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Full-Stack Application Developer passionate about problem-solving, software architecture, and technical solution design. Based in France since 2021, I've been interested in programming for over twenty years. a curiosity that began at my IT high school in Rome (graduated in 2008, equivalent to French Baccalauréat, with initial training in web development: PHP/MySQL) and has been nurtured through constant exploration of development paradigms and best practices.
about.paragraph2: I formalized my path with a Java EE Analyst Programmer certification in Rome in 2020, followed by the French Application Designer & Developer certification (RNCP level 6). These steps, completed in two different linguistic contexts, reflect my determination to transfer technical skills into a rigorous professional framework.
about.paragraph3: My approach prioritizes clean code, structural solidity, and eco-design. My background in psychology complements this technical profile by providing a deeper understanding of user needs and facilitating exchanges within collaborative projects.
about.paragraph4: I'm now looking to join a structured team to work on complex architecture challenges and continue growing in a demanding environment.
about.quote: "What I cannot create, I do not understand." – Richard Feynman
about.location: Based in La Maxe, Grand Est, France

items.title: Pax Canina - Dog Club Management
items.description: Full-Stack application developed over 6 months for the RNCP Application Designer & Developer certification. Complete dog club management system with JWT authentication, multi-role management (owners, trainers, admin), course booking, and dynamic dashboards. Feature-driven modular architecture.

items.title: Auberge Espagnole - E-commerce
items.description: Full-Stack e-commerce application for authentic Spanish products. Product catalog with category filtering, cart management, responsive modern design. Modern tech stack with TypeScript, Prisma ORM, and TailwindCSS. Actively developed project.

items.title: Coming Soon...
items.description: A new Full-Stack project is currently in the design phase. Stay tuned to discover soon a new application demonstrating my skills in software architecture and modern development.
Client needs analysis to develop customized solutions. Feature and application development in response to specific requirements.
Inventory management and team training. Product presentation and improvement of inventory processes.
Inventory management and logistics flow optimization. Franchisee training and team performance monitoring.
Technical maintenance and data management. Hardware repair and technical support.

passions.title: Outside the Code
passions.subtitle: A few things I genuinely care about beyond work.

items.title: Warhammer & Miniature Painting
items.subtitle: Tabletop Wargames
items.description: More than just painting, it's building army lists, assembling models, and playing them on the table. I've been into it for years. The hobby never gets old.

items.title: Chess & Board Games
items.subtitle: Strategy & Good Company
items.description: Chess has been with me since childhood. I love how deep it goes, there's always something new to understand. Board games in general are also a big yes: nothing beats a good session with the right people.

items.title: Reading
items.subtitle: Tech, Psychology, History & Fantasy
items.description: From technical books to fantasy novels, through psychology and history. Reading keeps me curious and takes me places that have nothing to do with each other, which is exactly the point.

items.title: Weightlifting
items.subtitle: Training & Wellbeing
items.description: I've been training for a long time, not for the aesthetics. It's how I manage stress and clear my head. In a world that rarely slows down, having that space matters. The physical side is just a nice bonus.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Interested in my profile? Feel free to contact me to discuss your projects or a potential collaboration.
